dr.inference.distribution
Class DistributionLikelihood

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.Likelihood.Abstract
      dr.inference.distribution.AbstractDistributionLikelihood
          dr.inference.distribution.DistributionLikelihood
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loggable, Likelihood, ModelListener, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ModelSpecificPseudoPriorLikelihood, TwoPartsDistributionLikelihood
public class DistributionLikelihood
extends AbstractDistributionLikelihood

A class that returns the log likelihood of a set of data (statistics) being distributed according to the given parametric distribution.

Version:
$Id: DistributionLikelihood.java,v 1.11 2005/05/25 09:35:28 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Alexei Drummond

evaluateEarly

public boolean evaluateEarly()
Specified by:
evaluateEarly in interface Likelihood
Overrides:
evaluateEarly in class Likelihood.Abstract
Returns:
true if this likelihood should be evaluated early (if for example it may return a zero likelihood and could terminate the evaluation early or is a required conditioning for another likelihood.
